property.name: languageMappingsUri
property.documentation: URI specifying the specific mappings from model types to language types. (i.e. file:${basedir}/JavaMappings.xml)

property.name: wrapperMappingsUri
property.documentation: URI specifying primitive type to wrapper types (i.e. int -> java.lang.Integer) (i.e. file:${basedir}/JavaWrapperMappings.xml)

property.name: pluralizeAssociationEndNames
property.documentation: Turns on/off the pluralization of association ends with multiplicities greater than one. You'll want to turn off this feature if your model is in a language other than english.

property.name: namespaceSeparator
property.documentation: Used to separate namespaces within the generated code. For example setting this to '.' causes fully qualified names to be defined as 'some.package.name.SomeClass'.

property.name: undefinedName
property.documentation: When a model element name is unspecified this is the name used (instead of null).

property.name: arrayNameSuffix
property.documentation: The suffix given to array names.

property.name: useArraysForMultiplicitiesOfTypeMany
property.documentation: Whether or not array types should denote multiplicities greater than one for associations between objects where appropriate (i.e. value objects when exposed as webservices).

property.name: maxSqlNameLength
property.documentation: The maximum length that a SQL name (such as a column name or table name) may be. This is useful for databases that have a limit on the lengh that a name used in DDL may be (like Oracle). If you set this to 30 for example, then all names will be truncated after 30 characters when retrieveing the column name or table name.

property.name: tableNamePrefix
property.documentation: The prefix to give all persistent entity table names. For example if you had an entity named 'Car' and you defined the tableNamePrefix as 'My_', then the table name for the 'Car' entity would be 'My_Car'.

property.name: foreignKeySuffix
property.documentation: The suffix to use when creating foreign keys for entity associations.

property.name: constraintSuffix
property.documentation: The suffix to use when creating constraints such as for entity associations. This is appended to the foreignKeySuffix suffix for foreign key constraint names.

property.name: manageablePackageSuffix
property.documentation: The name of the subpackage that will be used for the generation of <<Manageable>> entities.

property.name: sqlNameSeparator
property.documentation: Definies what is used for seperating words when SQL names are constructed, for example a model element named CompanyAddress would be translated to COMPANY_ADDRESS if the value of sqlNameSeparator was '_'.

property.name: classifierNameMask
property.documentation: Provides the ability to apply a mask to all classifier names.

property.name: operationNameMask
property.documentation: Provides the ability to apply a mask to all operation names.

property.name: classifierPropertyNameMask
property.documentation: Provides the ability to apply a mask to all classifier property names.

property.name: roleNameMask
property.documentation: Provides the ability to apply a mask to role names (roles are actors marked with the role stereotype).

property.name: enumerationNameMask
property.documentation: Provides the ability to apply a mask to enumeration names.

property.name: entityNameMask
property.documentation: Provides the ability to apply a mask to entity names.

property.name: entityPropertyNameMask
property.documentation: Provides the ability to apply a mask to entity property names.

property.name: parameterNameMask
property.documentation: Provides the ability to apply a mask to all parameter names.

property.name: enumerationLiteralNameMask
property.documentation: Provides the ability to apply a mask to all enumeration literal names.

property.name: enableMetafacadePropertyCaching
property.documentation: Used for performance reasons, caching a metafacade's properties significantly speeds up the code generation process. Can be disabled when debugging. This feature can be set on a per cartridge basis.

property.name: defaultMultiplicity
property.documentation: The default multiplicity to use when nothing is defined, the possible values are 0 or 1.

property.name: preconditionNamePattern
property.documentation: The pattern used for constructing an operation's precondition name.

property.name: postconditionNamePattern
property.documentation: The pattern used to constructing an operation's postcondition name.

property.name: sqlMappingsUri
property.documentation: The URI to the the SQL mappings file.

property.name: jdbcMappingsUri
property.documentation: The URI to the the JDBC mappings file.

property.name: manageableServiceAccessorPattern
property.documentation: The pattern used for constructing the accessor's for manageable services. Used with CRUD.

property.name: allowDefaultIdentifiers
property.documentation: Specifies whether or not default identifiers should be created for entities that do not have them modeled.

property.name: defaultIdentifierPattern
property.documentation: The pattern used to construct the default identifier name of an entity, where {0} represents the name of the entity as lower camel case (i.e. if defaultIdentifierPattern had a value of {0}Id, then the resulting identifier of a an Entity named PersonName would be personNameId).

property.name: defaultIdentifierType
property.documentation: The type to give default identifiers.

property.name: defaultIdentifierVisibility
property.documentation: The visibility to give default identifiers.

property.name: relationNameSeparator
property.documentation: The separator used for constructing a relation name between two associations.
